article.title: Status and history for [lin]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Replaced all occurrences of U+2018 ‘ by U+2019 ’; thanks to Denis Moyogo Jacquerye for the clarification.
typo correction in first article, "base, geli" to "basengeli"; thanks to Denis Moyogo Jacquerye.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
